text: Endre Salgó (December 11, 1913 - 1945) was a Hungarian field handball player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was born and died in Budapest. Salgó was part of the Hungarian field handball team, which finished fourth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches. ==References== *sports- reference profile *profile Category:1913 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Field handball players at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Hungary
title: Endre Salgó
